website_summaries.verdict: A basic rail cover to keep your baby from chewing on the crib rail and ingesting paint and wood.
pros: Fits long and front side crib rails measuring up to 8 inches around
Includes one long rail cover for the front or back
Made with soft chenille on top and back with a soft middle layer
Comes in white and pink, white and gray, and white and blue
cons: Could use more padding, but it does the most important thing – keeps harmful paint and wood out of the baby's mouth

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: In a perfect world I would have these crib rail guard things (I don’t really like the look of it) but after my daughter was basically chewing through her crib I knew I had to get something. I seared on amazon and ended up buying this. It has stopped her from chewing on her crib, thankfully, and it’s super soft and has held up through mulitiple washes.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Party of 4

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product Nice to see and touch, it is super soft and has two colored sides to choose from. Washed and dried well, still look great
customer_reviews.author: Rose H. 🌈Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: It's weird to love crib railing guards this much.
customer_reviews.text: These are so great! My son got tall enough to chew on his crib railing and would do so every morning when he woke up. I had tried some DIY options and wish that I would have just sprung for these. The ties are sewn into one side, so baby can't get them off and pose a safety hazard. They feel like stuffed animals on the crib, and they look so much nicer than my rinky-dink setup from before. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cristan B.

customer_reviews.title: I love how super soft it is to the touch
customer_reviews.text: This product is superb! I love how super soft it is to the touch. Reminds me of the minky material without the raised dots. I love that it’s reversible and how easy it is to install. We made the mistake of applying one of those rubber adhesive bumpers to our crib rail. Our little one quickly figured out how to pull it off and unfortunately ripped a nice layer of paint and wood with it. This rail cover covers it completely and I don’t have to worry about her hurting herself on the damaged rail underneath. I highly recommend this product. SUPER SOFT!!!
customer_reviews.author: MMcAtee

customer_reviews.title: Nice covers
customer_reviews.text: Just put these covers on this week. So far so good. Very soft. Seems like a good quality product. I was worried it wouldn't fit the front part of my crib, since my crib has kind of like a double rail, but I fit it on easily.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: It is so soft! My son was notorious for eating his crib. Put this on and no more teeth marks! Easy to install! Took 2 minutes. Absolutely love.
customer_reviews.author: Sara K.

customer_reviews.title: Only ONE piece!! Broke anyways
customer_reviews.text: Like others, I went back and forth on whether this listing was for the 3pc set or one piece. It is only for the front rail, but what you need is three total which would include two for the sides. One piece ladies and gentleman will NOT do you any good. I had the best of intentions to later order the sides, but I didn't in time. Well my cute little monster ate her crib on the sides. The one piece that comes in the listing ended up having one of the ties rip off the first time I put it on after washing. So the sturdiness of this product was seriously lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Use the Instructions on this Page for Install
customer_reviews.text: Our 9-month-old was chewing the edge of his minicrib, and I had no ideas these things existed until searching Amazon. Pretty simple, but soft while still sturdy construction. Instructions for install were nonexistent on the packaging, so I had to go to the product page, but it was simple once you know how you're supposed to thread the strings. Even with a simple tied bow our son hasn't been able to get it off and he is happy to chew on it instead of the front rail. I wish I had measured for size before purchasing since it is a bit long for the minicrib, but folding the ends worked fine and causes no issues. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: I got a hand-me-down crib and the previous owners son had chewed on the edges of the crib. I got this rail cover to cover the chew marks and it is the softest thing ever. It's easy to put on. My daughter goes to bite the rail and gets this rather than the wood, which puts my mind at ease that she isn't eating paint or wood chips. The only thing is that she can untie them and sometimes it bunches up because the ties can slide around in the rail holes. These aren't that big of deals though and I would still buy again.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea c.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Teething Beaver Babies
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. My 1 yr old figured out he could chew on his crib like a freaking teething beaver. He came out of a nap one day with paint chips all over his face from his crib, so I immediately got on amazon and found these. They are so so soft and I love the little cushion they give. It’s also easy to tie them so my dragon of a child cannot undo them. (I do love my little dragon). Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made my baby's cheeks red?!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't figure out why my baby had an ongoing rash on his cheeks and chin. Thought it was an allergy. Removed these crib rail covers, and it went away in two days! Unbelievable. ...Just realized I gave up dairy for nothing!
customer_reviews.author: Question

customer_reviews.title: Not enough cushion
customer_reviews.text: I ordered to prevent my infant from hurting herself on the side bar. She’s able to pull up now so I wanted cushion there to prevent injuries in case she got excited and bobbed her head. It’s a soft texture but there’s no cushion. You can still feel the crib underneath really well. It just feels like a fleece
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Adeniran

customer_reviews.title: Great to prevent damage with teething toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Very soft crib bumper. One of my twin toddlers started chewing on the edge of the crib and this helped prevent any further damage to the crib and from him eating any wood. The fabric is very soft, durable, and easily washed in the washing machine. Highly recommend if you having teething toddlers!
customer_reviews.author: shea

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product!! I wish I had known about this before. Our daughter, apparently like a lot of kids, was chewing on the crib rail. I tried so many different things to try to get her to stop. I tried wiping it down with vinegar, some essential oils even lemon juice... didn't bother her at all. Once I saw this, I had to try it and it worked like a charm!! This is easy to wash, doesn't harm the child (or the crib) and works perfectly! I would absolutely recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Pinkribbon20Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It solved the problem of my granddaughter ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It solved the problem of my granddaughter chewing the wood on her crib, and it's super soft like a really expensive plus toy! I washed it before putting it on, and I dried it on gentle. It didn't shrink at all. If you can tie a knot, you can put this on! Couldn't be easier!
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: My baby was scraping paint off his crib when his teeth came in!!! We didn’t know what to do because he’d have paint all over his face when he woke up from his nap. Thankfully poison control said he’d be fine, but try to find a way to stop it from continuing. So we bought this! We didn’t need the side ones, but this was PERFECT. It covered everything we needed and kept him safe! Also, it is a pleasant color and goes well with most anything because it is neutral.
customer_reviews.author: shopgirl2012

customer_reviews.title: Ample padding and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Ordering these for the second time for my younger son because they are great! It’s well padded and the original pair has held up well two years later. This is a great product to prevent the dreaded bite marks to keep your crib in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: So soft and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: The material on this is super soft. It is machine washable and it ties easily on the rail of the crib. It definitely protects the wood on the crib as my daughter likes to chew on it. I like having it there for her to hold onto when she stands in her crib as well since it adds a nice cushion. On top of that, the extra pop of color makes the crib look stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Wife-Mom-Teacher...tired

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: My baby has recently taken to standing in the crib and we needed to get covers so he would not chew on the crib itself. This design fit his theme of clouds and moons and it is very cute and soft, and it fit the crib rail exactly as specified. I have washed it twice and it has not shrunk and still looks as good as new. We have been using it for over a month now. I would highly recommend this if you need a rail cover for your baby.
customer_reviews.author: LoveWatermelons

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these! They’re soooo incredibly soft and kept my son from chewing on his crib (which he has now grown out of). He did chew on the ties and on the soft white part, which I was worried would stain, but every time it came out looking brand new with a quick wash! I did lots of research before purchasing these and I’m glad I picked these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and protects the crib rail!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the front and side rail covers, narrow size, for our baby's crib as soon as we noticed some bite marks, and it's so easy to install, fits perfectly, and is SO soft that our little one even rests his head on it :) Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Brennan Fam

customer_reviews.title: Teething baby chewing up your crib?
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo has chewed everywhere he could get his teeth. These are splinter saving! Haha they do they job wonderfully and they are super soft. I didn’t really care about they softness just the thickness though. He is unable to bite through and I’ve had them a few weeks! They are cute and they do a wonderful job! Definitely must for a teething baby and not too bad on price. They fit my crib perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: So soft. Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: You can’t tell from the product image, but theses are thick & soft. I love the hand feel. Pretty. Easy to install. I like them. My only gripe is that the product label is very visible on the outside (white side) so I had to cut these so aesthetics appeal. Also, the ties are not long enough for proper bows (a detail that may not bother most). Be sure to cut any remaining threads! I found a few.
customer_reviews.author: caz

customer_reviews.title: Soft and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This took me a minute to figure out the best way to tie on but once I did it looked nice. It keeps my toddler from chewing on the crib. Easy to clean. It washes nice in the washer and dryer. I like that it’s reversible so I can use both sides. It’s soft. I wish it was just a little bit longer and fit a little tighter. I would recommend this to a friend though.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: Soooooo soft! Fits nicely and super easy to put on, I love that it is double-sided, so when you get bored of one side, just switch it the other! I recommend to tie it pretty tight, especially the ones on the far edges so it doesn't slide. I love how it makes the crib look so much comfier! Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little beaver no more lol
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this teething guard ... my first kid , I didnt have a problem with her biting the wood , with this little beaver...he went for it non stop.... so this thing is great! Super super soft , fits my old delta crib perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even helps deter chewing on the crib!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful soft material that does NOT shed. Not only does it look great and protect my crib, it seems to also deter kiddo from chewing - huge bonus! Love that it is easy to install and take off to wash - maintains its softness even after washing it with a mild sensitive skin (fragrance free and dye free) detergent and drying it in the dryer at a low setting (without fabric softener).
customer_reviews.author: Rosey Posey

customer_reviews.title: Ehh, could be better.
customer_reviews.text: I really wise there was a better way to make these without the hanging scrunchies. Maybe a zip up or clip? My 15 month old son pulls on these, puts them in his mouth, unties them. He does this every time for about 15-30 minutes before finally falling asleep. Otherwise, the product is soft and does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Anna K

customer_reviews.title: Plush, soft, looks expensive
customer_reviews.text: Plush, super soft, looks expensive, makes her crib look better and makes the crib look expensive! I'm using it on a minicrib, as they don't make anything for minicrib, and it looks great and I was able to place it in such a way that it stays flat and doesn't bunch up. So happy I got this. Baby likes it too. She likes running her hands over it.
customer_reviews.author: Wedge

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cuddly...
customer_reviews.text: These are so soft and plush. I have 3 children and my older 2 never bit on their cribs. My son is an entirely different story. I didn't even know these were invented because I never needed them. I just wish they were a tad longer because there is a small piece of railing still unprotected. Other than that, I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plush, well-made, and attractive
customer_reviews.text: These crib rail covers are just what we wanted and needed! I was concerned that they wouldn't quite make their way around the rails of our Babyletto Modo, but they'll be great. In my opinion, they're far more attractive than the longer covers on the market, and the ABC brand covers are cheaper and softer than Trend Lab's.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Very soft and pleasant to touch
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very soft and pleasant to touch, very easy to wash and dry! My baby is 8 months old so I definitely needed something to protect the crib so she doesn't hurt herself. Great colors.. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina.R.

customer_reviews.title: so good. My little guy was gnawing on the crib ...
customer_reviews.text: I threw it on the crib as soon as I got it so haven't washed it yet. But so far, so good. My little guy was gnawing on the crib and had paint chips all over him by day 2. (Cheap crib.) So far this has solved the problem. Eventually he will start playing with the ties but for now, the covers are in place and doing their job. Very soft. Easy to put on. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JulieS

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Love the look and feel of it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Love the look and feel of it and protects the rails from my daughters teeth. The one downside, or warning to others purchasing, is it wasn't clear to me if it comes as a pair or just one cover. I saw in the questions someone asked this and the answer was that it comes as a package of 2. It is 2 covers per package if you order the shorter side rails. It is only 1 covering per package if you order the longer front rails. I only ordered 1 package since I thought 2 came in the package so, now I have to order a second package for the longer rails.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: So soft and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Once those adorable babes start standing (and falling) plus get those teeth and turn into beavers these come to the rescue! They are super soft to protect from bumps and bruises as Baby gets their sea legs! It alarm keeps them from chewing on the wood and getting a mouth full of wood shavings! It adds a cute touch to your nursery decor as well, win win!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Horton

customer_reviews.title: LIFESAVER
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought these! My son was really going to town on his crib rails chipping the paint off into his mouth. Lord only knows he would have gotten splinters if I left them bare much longer! I am paranoid so I tie them as far as they will tie then tuck them into the cover so he can’t choke on the tie.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Had to get these because little one was chewing on her crib, eating paint chips. They fit well and wash nicely. Might not need them anymore, but they look nice and why risk her starting to chew them again. Going to leave them on until she's in a toddler bed just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Duqrn87

customer_reviews.title: Soft and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: We bought a used crib that was a little chewed already, these wash great and keep my little from Chewing and bonking his head on the rail. Plus it's a extra touch of cute to the crib. I bought for the sides too.
customer_reviews.author: Thompsolonian

customer_reviews.title: Solution for your Crib Eater
customer_reviews.text: My son was chewing his crib and getting paint in his mouth, so I went looking thru Amazon. Because of other people’s reviews, I bought the crib border cover and it fit his crib perfectly. For the price and look, I definitely recommend this product to other parents that are having the same issue with their little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! My son suddenly started chewing his crib rails and there were gouge marks; I was afraid he would get splinters in his mouth. These fit our crib perfectly which was great since I didn't bother measuring. Ended up buying all 3 sides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install and Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: I put this on our crib being proactive so I can’t say how well they work against a teething baby quite yet but they seem thick enough to do a great job. Very cute too. I installed in minutes. I will say the strings aren’t quite long enough to have neat looking bows tied. We just tied the strings in a knot and let them hand down.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I found these. My son kept biting the top of his crib, And he has quite the teeth. So the paint was chipping and getting all over his face. I'm sure it's non toxic paint. I still don't want him eating the paint, or getting paint chips in his eyes. This product solved the problem! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: K. Culbert

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, thick, soft crib protector!
customer_reviews.text: When my daughter began eating her crib rail I knew it was time to get something to save her teeth. These are super soft and thick. They was nicely and I like that they are reversable. They fit the crib wonderfully! The only downside is that they take a little while to unstring and string back up. The holes where you string the ties are a bit snug.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K Hackenberg

customer_reviews.title: Stops Baby From Chewing On His/Her Crib & Easy To Wash
customer_reviews.text: This works really well, my son already "tested" it and he likes how it feels compared to the frame of our crib. The ties are really durable and they stretch a little which wasn't obvious during the install. It's a great product overall. I'm attaching some photos that show the before and after. The photos also include side rail covers. The covers are easy to wash too.
customer_reviews.author: ACinKC

customer_reviews.title: Beaver proof
customer_reviews.text: Evidently I give birth to beavers... All of my kids have gnawed through their wooden crib rails. this fit my thick curvy crib rail great. Had this for a couple of months. Baby girl has not been able to get it off or chew through it, although she’s given it a good try. Wish I could have had this for my boys.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Dennington

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Stopped my baby from gnawing on her crib. It is just a few inches too short to reach the entire length of the crib rail, but she hasn't noticed. Easy to wash and very soft.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Bought more for the appearance than the utility at this point since baby isn't going to be able to reach the top of the crib for quite a while but it looks very nice. Since bumpers are frowned upon these days you need something to soften the crib and this does the job.
customer_reviews.author: I. Joseph Marguliath

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly adorable
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter got her first 2 teeth and likes to bite/chew ANYTHING she can. These will protect our nice convertible crib so it can be used for years to come, not to mention how PERFECT they are in her celestial themed nursery.
customer_reviews.author: RMKohl16

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: We have a homemade wood crib that my 10 month old decided to start chewing. Since putting these on, he still gnaws on the crib, but these protect his mouth and the wood underneath. They stay in place once tied with a simple knot. The color I received was as pictured/described.
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Super soft; washes well
customer_reviews.text: The ties are a bit short, which makes them a bit difficult to tie (they're also very thick and plush!), but overall, the product washed well and is nice-looking, serving its purpose to eliminate teeth marks from at least one side of the crib.
customer_reviews.author: mmj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! So soft!
customer_reviews.text: SO SOFT! And cute without making the crib look cluttered and frumpy! Wish I would have bought them sooner cause my son had already been gnawing pretty hard on the edges of his crib, but they are doing their job now and keeping it from getting any worse!
customer_reviews.author: alana

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!! Found my daughter gnawing on the crib ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome!! Found my daughter gnawing on the crib rail and freaked out after seeing all the white paint in around her mouth- I first bought the one long front rail and after I washed it, it fit perfectly and it's super soft! I had to buy the side rails after that- needless to say I love these crib guards! I bought the light pink and white color.
customer_reviews.author: Jedaiah Delconte

customer_reviews.title: Only front rail - but does the job.
customer_reviews.text: It works, but based on the questions and reviews I was under the impression that it came with 3 rails, but it is only the front rail includes.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Winney

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these crib rail covers!! We have a convertible crib so they were obviously a little long but I folded them in a way that fit perfectly and still looks cute. The material is unbelievably soft which baby will love when she gets here and starts sleeping in her crib.
customer_reviews.author: M Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Directions on are the listing, I panicked when I thought I lost them because for some reason I couldn’t figure it out. When we pulled the directions up easy to install and very cute if you have a child that is leaving teeth marks on the rail like my child
customer_reviews.author: Courtnee Ford

customer_reviews.title: Crib Sides Liner
customer_reviews.text: I do like that this helps to protect the crib from baby chewing on the sides, however I wish it was made with snaps not ties as cute as those look our baby keeps pulling them apart which makes the fabric loose and almost comes off which negates the purpose of it. Other than that it does what it is supposed to do and it is easy to clean and the color looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My son was chewing on his crib every morning and us as first time parents got very worried. After putting this on his crib he stopped the chewing which gave me a peace of mind in the mornings. Would def recommend
customer_reviews.author: DC Texas gal

customer_reviews.title: Great for teething baby
customer_reviews.text: My 13 month old started a habit of chewing on his crib railing at night & this was the perfect fix. Not only does it protect him from the potential hazards of chewing on a painted wood crib railing, it actually looks nice too! Great buy especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: HW

customer_reviews.title: Small fit our 8.5" rail
customer_reviews.text: Our crib rails are 8.5" so we tried the large which were too big. Switched over to the small and even though they say they only worked to 8" they work great. Not thrilled with the ties hanging but they seem to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Protect the crib and are soft. Which is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Rocksand

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL and sooo perfect❣️
customer_reviews.text: 👶🏻🍼💕love LOVE L💜VE these rail guards❣️they match the nursery so perfectly and are soooo soft❣️not only are they just gorgeous, but so easy to assemble and REVERSIBLE❣️❣️❣️the chenille is so plush and i’m jealous my baby will have these to touch all the time😜these are just what i wanted and so much more🤗many thanks❣️
customer_reviews.author: cori

customer_reviews.title: As described.  Recommend washing before use.
customer_reviews.text: Huge help. Just wish I would have ordered and installed sooner. Advise parents to install no later than 4-5 months of age, or when they notice increase in drool to get maximum benefit!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous2019

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: easy to install, easy to clean because it is machine washable, it is thick and durable. fits well on my baby’s crib and color is perfect. Cons: not waterproof. Overall i love this product! it serves its purpose and the price is good too it wont break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: mja

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy about this! I bought this long cover and the 2 side covers, due to my son becoming a beaver and gnawing on his crib. They are super soft, look great on his crib, and provide this mama with no more worries of baby eating his crib!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Protect your crib, and baby with these bumpers!
customer_reviews.text: The bumpers are just as described. I nanny a baby who bites on the wood crib, so I got these and problem solved! They are a soft fleece, and they protect the crib, as well the baby from eating wood!!! Pricey for what they are, but this was the cheapest for the quality that I could find.
customer_reviews.author: shess

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! We bought this because my son was biting his crib and chewing off the paint. He hasn’t been able to bite it and peel the paint off since we put this on his crib. It’s easy to clean and install!
customer_reviews.author: Batel Benhamo

customer_reviews.title: we have washed a few times and it hasn't shrunk in size or changed the quality.
customer_reviews.text: Fit crib perfectly. Soft. Easy to put on/take off. (we tuck the ties back up under the fabric part so the baby doesn't chew on them. Easy to wash, we have washed a few times and it hasn't shrunk in size or changed the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!! Exactly what I was looking for!! Bonus: Its extra soft for baby!!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and definitely lasts through the washes. I've washed it 3 times already since we've had it and it's still in great condition. I put it in a lingerie bag for washing and drying and it comes out good as new. Would definitely buy again as a gift or for baby #2. Thank you American Baby Company for making such a great product that will last!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend. So soft!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these for my little one's bed. They are extremely soft and washed up very well. Wish i would have found these when my first two babies were in cribs. They do fit a bit snuggly. Have to pull very tight to cover all the wood because our crib's rail has a curve in the design.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: just awesome
customer_reviews.text: Got these and the side ones also for my sons crib, love knowing he can't bite on the rails, so soft too
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for side rails
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant when I bought it. But we love it!! It is soft and baby does not like to chew on it. He will chew on the string of he can get a hold on it.
customer_reviews.author: Anon0129

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and is holding up well against my teething son. Just make sure you stretch it out enough - I didn't and my son found a spot to gnaw on the crib. The material is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Ties are to short for my crib
customer_reviews.text: Product came. I opened it up, was super excited to put them on my daughters crib and the ties are to short to go around. I had to improvise and use her crib bumber strings to add to it to tie it around in order for it to stay. Would only recommend for people who have thin crib tops otherwise its not good.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It looks good..and it keeps my baby from gnawing on her crib rails. It’s really soft too. But I will warn you to take all the tags off before you start using it. My baby just threw up and she has ripped on of the tags and eaten it :(
customer_reviews.author: Martin C. Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Great for Infants & Tots
customer_reviews.text: I got these covers because of my teething infant and am impressed. They are easy to tie on and safe for my little guy during this tough time of teething and chewing on everything in sight♡
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get two
customer_reviews.text: Item is super soft and covered everything needed to be covered, but I got only one. I read the reviews and answer-question part, it was said it was supposed to come as a pair, but it didn’t...
customer_reviews.author: Ra Y

customer_reviews.title: A must for teething
customer_reviews.text: Easy to tie onto the crib and remove for washing. This product has saved our crib from little sharp teeth!! Very fashionable too; I was afraid we were going to have to buy some ugly plastic protectors, but was excited to find this soft alternative and in the color I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is incredibly soft and the holes are sturdy to loop the ties in
customer_reviews.text: This product is not deep enough and so it doesn’t fit my rail as pictured. Wish there was a deeper option. Fabric is incredibly soft and the holes are sturdy to loop the ties in, but the tie strings are not long enough for my style of a crib.
customer_reviews.author: APC

customer_reviews.title: Nice crib protector
customer_reviews.text: My 16 month old was starting to bite/chew/gnaw the crib railing. This was easy to attach, fit my standard-sized crib well, and did not seem to shrink in wash. So far so good, and I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Soft & Effective Rail Protector
customer_reviews.text: Rail cover arrived the very next day & is just what I needed to prevent my grandchild from gnawing on the crib rail. It's luxuriously soft & attractive, and seems very well made so I think it will last. I am so happy I chose this one!
customer_reviews.author: Magnolia Sue

customer_reviews.title: Works great to stop my son from chewing on his crib
customer_reviews.text: Works great to stop my son from chewing on his crib. Stays in place well. I tuck the straps back under the fabric after I double knot it so that my son doesn't try to grab the ties.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Scheff

customer_reviews.title: Cute, soft, but don’t stand a chance against baby beavers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the white and pink. These are very cute and the material is so soft. Fits our crib perfectly, both front and side rails. However, my baby must me chewing hard on the rails because I removed the rails to wash them today, had them on about a month or so, and the crib rails are horribly chewed. Paint scraped off of and all. 3 stars bc they’re cute and soft, but don’t protect the rails against baby beavers.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin C

customer_reviews.title: The Baby's Reign Is OVER
customer_reviews.text: Tired of your baby chewing a hole in your expensive crib? This is for you! This was very easy to install, no stressing! The baby can gnaw on this all they want and their cage will stay intact. Rest assured that your baby will finally sleep contained without chunks of crib in their mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our baby was biting the railing on our high end crib! I am so happy I found this! Not only does it protect the crib and her teeth, but it looks gorgeous! It’s super soft and I love that I a reversible! We use the gray side!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the look and feel of this crib rail protector ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and feel of this crib rail protector and the fact that it is reversible. It is just slightly short of covering the whole railing, earning it four of five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy on/Easy off and saved my crib!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this rail for my sons crib! It is soft and durible and has helped protect the innocent rail of our crib from a little teething machine! It’s easy to put on and take off and the material doesn’t pelt! This is a great buy if your little one nibbles on the rails!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara K

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I got the smaller ones and they fit perfectly! We have a restoration hardware crib that is bulkier so I was worried they would be too small, but are a perfect fit! Tied in knots and so far baby has not untied them and not chewing the crib anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased
customer_reviews.text: Really cute, thick, and works great to keep baby's teeth off of the rails of the crib!
customer_reviews.author: House Skarr

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, super soft and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft! Protects crib from baby biting it. Super cute too!
customer_reviews.author: hgmarsden

customer_reviews.title: Soft and useful
customer_reviews.text: So soft and a great solution to cover up old bite marks and prevent new ones Love it
customer_reviews.author: DA68

customer_reviews.title: Looks wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect! Our baby boy started to bite the side of his crib so we got this hoping it would at least protect him but after we put it up he stopped altogether. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Used on my mini crib, just cooked the ends in. Soft and fluffy, and easily secured.
customer_reviews.author: Goldilocks.Zone

customer_reviews.title: Protects crib from bite marks
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Easy to wash and has held up well. I do wish there was an easier way to attach it other than tying it because it’s a hassle to wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Sims

customer_reviews.title: A crib necessity!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd gotten this before my twins destroyed their crib rails! Easy to use, so soft, and cute too. Get 2 so you can swap them out for washing.
customer_reviews.author: psfaux

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and cute
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice seeing my baby chew on this instead of his wooden crib. Alot less to worry about. Lol super soft and good quality. Can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha M.

customer_reviews.title: Time too quickly
customer_reviews.text: Two of the traps broke within a month.. had to sow it back together. They really should last longer than that!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Shrinks in the wash, 51in. to 47in
customer_reviews.text: I bought the narrow front rail version it says it's 51 inches. I opened the package and laid it across the railing and it fit. I washed it before I put it on and it shrunk to 47inch. Still does the job but wish it didn't shrink and fit the full length of the crib.
customer_reviews.author: MONICA

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect! Our little one was chewing on his crib ...
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect! Our little one was chewing on his crib when teething. After we put this on, he tried a few times, but this protected the crib from any further damage. Fit the crib well. I double knotted the ties so that he would not play with them.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Jos

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and perfect
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this! It was easy to put on my crib and super soft. I think it looks nice on the rail too. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! (side note
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly from stopping my teething daughter from chewing up the top rail of her crib! They are so incredibly soft and they fit snug so I'm not worried about them moving around. Highly recommend! (side note, we have the babyletto Hudson crib and these are perfect!)
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

product_meta.title: American Baby Company Supreme 1 Pack Heavenly Soft Narrow Reversible Crib Rail Cover for Long Rail, Gray and White, for Rails Measuring up to 4" Folded
product_meta.description: Size:Front Rail-Narrow Size| Color:Gray/WhiteAmerican Baby Company's Rail Cover for narrow crib rails is the perfect solution for protecting your crib and teething baby. With super soft chenille on the top, a light padding in the middle and reversible chenille backing, you no longer have to worry about your baby ingesting wood or harmful toxins. Long rail cover measures 51" x 7" with ties. Also available in 2 piece set for side rails. Fits crib rails measuring up to 8" around. Machine wash cold with gentle cycle.
feature_bullets: 100% polyester. For Long Crib Rail: 51 X 7 inches
Protect your teething baby from splinters, paint chips and peeling
Fits NARROW front crib rails measuring up to 8 inches around
Includes one long rail cover for crib front or back
Rail cover is made with soft chenille on top & back with a soft filler middle layer for ultimate protection

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars869 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
